name: Kratom-Induced Cholestatic Hepatitis with Opioid Withdrawal Syndrome
chief_complaint: I can't stop taking kratom, but now my skin is yellow and I feel terrible when I try to quit
prognosis: Guarded; liver function typically recovers within 3-6 months with abstinence, but risk of relapse is high without comprehensive addiction treatment
description: A complex dual presentation of cholestatic liver injury from chronic kratom use combined with opioid withdrawal symptoms upon cessation. The condition involves both hepatotoxicity from mitragynine alkaloids and opioid receptor modulation effects.
multiple_choice: Kratom-Induced Cholestatic Hepatitis with Opioid Withdrawal Syndrome
